channel.title: Vagrant Vcloud on Things I find interesting
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant Vcloud on Things I find interesting

item.title: Installing Vagrant and the vagrant-vcloud plugin on CentOS 6.x
item.description: In this post I’m setting out to explain how to create a CentOS 6.4 vm, from template, in vCHS (or a vCloud Director instance) and then install vagrant-vcloud on that. 1. Create a CentOS 6.x minimal virtual machine from a template in a vCHS organization. I will demonstrate creating a new CentOS vm in vCHS using a template, but you could just as easily create a new CentOS virtual machine from scratch in vCloud Director.
